name: test_e2e_with_logs[049_SQLI_TIME_015]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_015` |
| **Name** | Sleep with comment obfuscation |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/**/SLEEP/**/(5)`
- **Encoded**: `/%2A%2A/SLEEP/%2A%2A/%285%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results
